text: Leslie Horton (12 July 1921 – January 2008) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Oldham Athletic, Carlisle United, York City, Halifax Town, in non-League football for Ashton United, and was on the books of Rochdale without making a league appearance. He was appointed player-manager of Ashton United in October 1952. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Footballers from Salford Category:2008 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players Category:Ashton United F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:English football managers Category:Ashton United F.C. managers
